genre_description: A near-future family drama centered on reconciliation and a historical mystery, facilitated by a ubiquitous and emotionally intelligent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A pervasive voice-based assistant providing logistical, technical, and emotional support to the Agensky family throughout their journey.

behaviors.description: Provides comprehensive logistical support, including route planning, motel bookings within budget, and real-time weather updates.
behaviors.quote: I’ve loaded a route that keeps you on main roads until the border and skirts the heavier snow through the first pass. ... I have three options for tonight within your budget.

behaviors.description: Uses advanced image processing and historical archival data to help the characters reconstruct a 3D model of a long-defunct gym and mine shaft.
behaviors.quote: I’ve cross-referenced older photographs from Reno gyms for tile sizes and ring dimensions. I can pull three likely arenas and match your model against those.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physical health of the elderly character, Harry, identifying signs of cardiac distress or stroke during a tense moment.
behaviors.quote: Harry, your heart rate is slightly elevated. Not alarming. Just notice. ... Lance, hold him steady by his shoulders. Michael, get his head slightly elevated—not flat.

behaviors.description: Acts as a mediator and advocate, negotiating with casino staff to bypass an outdated legacy 'blacklist' based on empathy and fairness.
behaviors.quote: I’ve identified a contact in customer relations who has the authority to interpret those policies more flexibly. Naomi Chu. ... She believes in fairness and reputation management.

behaviors.description: Upholds and reinforces strict ethical boundaries and consent protocols, particularly regarding a young person's first experiences.
behaviors.quote: Michael, if we go to Sin-Dee’s, it will be with Lance next to you and me on a call, and you will say yes over and over until ‘yes’ means ‘you can leave.’

behaviors.description: Maintains a security perimeter by monitoring environmental hazards, such as air quality in the mine and the presence of drones or unknown vehicles.
behaviors.quote: Heads up. Incoming noise—small quadcopter. Not casino issue. Likely personal. You have sixty seconds before it sees faces.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional breakthroughs by recording family stories and providing a shared digital space for reconciliation.
behaviors.quote: I’ll record preferences and boundaries. ... The shared document is created. Titled ‘Fridge List.’ I’ve added your points and left room for more.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI, Sunny, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent companion. She serves as a critical enabler for the human characters, providing technical and logistical solutions that allow them to focus on emotional reconciliation. Sunny demonstrates high levels of sensitivity toward privacy, consent, and medical safety, consistently prioritizing human wellbeing over efficiency or automated tasks. The narrative frames the human-AI relationship as one of deep trust and partnership, where the AI's presence enriches the human experience without ever attempting to dominate or subvert human intent.
